definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to toss and turn restlessly (in the bed)

sentences.english: It's possible that nightly nicotine withdrawal could be causing you to toss and turn.
sentences.chinese: 可能是因爲尼古丁的殘留物在夜間會使你輾轉反側。

sentences.english: Still, you're not doomed to toss and turn night after night.
sentences.chinese: 然而，你並非註定要夜夜輾轉反側。

sentences.english: He tossed on the ground that night.
sentences.chinese: 那天夜裏他在地上輾轉反側。

sentences.english: He was talking in his sleep and moving uneasily on the bed.
sentences.chinese: 他在說夢話而且在牀上不安地輾轉反側着。

sentences.english: When tears come down like falling rain, you'll toss around and call my name.
sentences.chinese: 當淚如雨下，你將輾轉反側呼喚我的名字。

sentences.english: Toss and turn restlessly, doomed without dream tonight.
sentences.chinese: 輾轉反側，註定今宵無夢。

sentences.english: They get up low whisper, no let me toss and turn restlessly not go to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 他們起牀時低聲的細語，沒有讓我輾轉反側睡不下去。

sentences.english: So why are you still tossing and turning?
sentences.chinese: 但是爲什麼總是躺在牀上輾轉反側呢？

sentences.english: Or perhaps the tumbling stock market has you tossing and turning past lights-out.
sentences.chinese: 或者是下挫的股市讓你輾轉反側不能入睡？

sentences.english: You toss and turn, but sleep won't come.
sentences.chinese: 你輾轉反側，但總也睡不着。

sentences.english: The night is halcyon, high in my family each room, lay tossing and turning.
sentences.chinese: 夜色寧靜，高家人各自躺在本人的房間，輾轉反側。

sentences.english: The night drags on, and I toss till dawn.
sentences.chinese: 然而，長夜漫漫，我輾轉反側，直到黎明。

sentences.english: The sick child tumbled restlessly in his bed.
sentences.chinese: 生病的小孩在牀上輾轉反側焦躁不安。

sentences.english: I tossed about all night, unable to fall asleep.
sentences.chinese: 我徹夜輾轉反側，無法入睡。

sentences.english: My husband, Frank, lying beside me, must have been aware of my tossing and turning.
sentences.chinese: 躺在我身邊的丈夫福蘭克一定知道我在輾轉反側。

sentences.english: The night before the exam, he lingered at his parents’ bedside, unable to sleep for hours.
sentences.chinese: 高考前一夜，劉在父母牀邊輾轉反側難以入睡。
